plot: A poignant exposé of pity-based fundraising, as revealed through a disabled pre-teen's heartfelt appeal for respect and dignity.
title: No Pity
plot_es: A poignant exposé of pity-based fundraising, as revealed through a disabled pre-teen's heartfelt appeal for respect and dignity.
plot_en: A poignant exposé of pity-based fundraising, as revealed through a disabled pre-teen's heartfelt appeal for respect and dignity.
